bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [NR3] REGRESSION! Example Apps and Example Wiki
bug.description:
Check all example apps and wiki examples. We haven't included them in CI for a while and it started breaking.
Fix them all Check examples in Wiki Reenable CI for example apps.
This may be simultaneously worked with migration to nnstreamer-example.git

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/937>#937</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
Wiki page about nnstreamer example is updated (build nnstreamer and example with meson)
